creator: Gary_Weaver@srspos.com
text:
The RegexFilenameFilter that takes options as a parameter and is supposed to 
set options doesn't set the options.  As a temporary fix, we call 
setFilterExpression(java.lang.String regex, int options).

Bug confirmed and fixed.  Will wait until reporter verifies before closing
(don't forget you have to check out the latest source from CVS to get the
fix).
creator: dfs@apache.org

text:
Marking bug as closed as since there's been no followup indicating the
fix didn't work.
creator: dfs@apache.org
